From: Rabia Anjum 
Sent: Thursday, 20 March 2025 1:43 PM
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Group Insurance Billing Data _ From Dec'24 to Feb'25

 

 

Hi Hagop, 

 

Can you please share the billing data of Group Insurance function for previous 3 months i.e., Dec’24, Jan’25 & Feb’25 issued through ICSB/ Pluto, etc. 

 

The required data should include the below fields:

 

Issuing Legal Entity

RECIPIENT_LEGAL_ENTITY

CC_CODE_TO_CHARGE

COST_CENTER_TO_CHARGE_DESC

Fee

QTY

Invoice Amount

Invoice Currency

Source (ICSB/Pluto)

Service (Real estate, Admin, Travel,etc)

Month

Year

 

I would highly appreciate if you can share it by tomorrow. 

 

Thanks & Regards, 

RABIA ANJUM​​​​

ANALYST ‑ FINANCIAL REPORTING

REAL FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

		
 

 <https://chalhoubgroup.com/> 

CHALHOUBGROUP.COM <http://www.chalhoubgroup.com/>
